column5: I'll be picking up some Okuma Convector reels for downriggers and also for Dipsys. Not sure which size is best. I was palming the 30 size at Sail ..man that's a big reel. Do I really need this size for Lake "O" salmon ? or could I get by with 20 size?
Lake O i would definately say the 30's  GBay 20's are fine.  If you decide to run braid then the 20's would be fine... IMO  Dan
30's for Lake O trolling and dipseys.
The first time a tyee screams off a few hundred feet of drag on a run you will be glad you had the 30
30's it is. Thanks all for info
